title: Mussulman
common: List of families with at least a Muslim ancestor:

value.name: Maia
value.desc: is an old Portuguese family with the patriarch Aboazar Lovezendes, that supposed to have Arabic ancestors.

value.name: Qasi
value.desc: are descendants of Qasi count, that became a Muslim when the Arab began the Iberica peninsula conquest.

value.name: Om√©ia
value.desc: is a dynasty that extended the Arab control from Persia to Portugal. This family is the supposed ancestors of the Portuguese Maia family.
